attributes.action: ban cameras and camera phones from concerts and gigs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Let's discourage gig and concert goers from using their cameras and camera phones. I appreciate that with any audience based event you can find fault with people’s lack of respect for their fellow punter, you pay your money and you take your chances. However, there are some things which are becoming intolerable. 

When I’m at a gig or concert I’m sure I’m not alone in wishing people would put away their cameras and camera phones? I don’t see why I should have to watch the band through a sea of arms all trying to record the event, it’s nigh on impossible to ignore a bright LCD screen waving around in your line of sight.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
